title: How to Use the Nordic Ware Brownie Pan

steps.headline: Spray a Nordic Ware Brownie pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Add sugar, shortening, eggs and vanilla to a mixing bowl.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir well.
Spread brownie batter into prepared pan.
Microwave 5 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Remove the pan from the microwave oven and let brownies stand for a few minutes before cutting into serving pieces.

text: Spray a Nordic Ware Brownie pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Add sugar, shortening, eggs and vanilla to a mixing bowl. Mix until creamy. Add the remaining ingredients and stir well.  Stir in remaining ingredients.  Spread brownie batter into prepared pan.  Microwave 5 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.  Remove the pan from the microwave oven and let brownies stand for a few minutes before cutting into serving pieces.  Finished.
